entry.title: New release for Immich Android TV: 3.6.1
entry.content:
3.6.1 Fix videos stopping the slideshow when interacting with the controls

3.6.0 Add font size and padding options to the metadata shown in viewer/screensaver

3.5.0 Metadata customizer, you can now move metadata to the left/right and change the order. Font size and padding are coming up. Fix issue highlighted icon not being visible in the videoplayer in screensaver. Do not auto show the controller when playing videos. Select down button to bring it up.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/giejay/Immich-Android-TV/compare/3.1.1...3.6.1

entry.title: New release for Immich Android TV: 3.7.0
entry.content:
3.7.0 Add FileName, FilePath + Camera to MetaData options Add sorting and filtering (by content type, image/video) in all views. Select "right" on the most right asset in the viewer to toggle a popup with the settings.

3.6.2 Fix album name not showing in view mode.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/giejay/Immich-Android-TV/compare/3.6.1...3.7.0
